title: Pre- and post-implementation protocol for non-operative management of grade III-V splenic injuries: An observational study
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ismail Mahmood, Basil Younis, Mohammad Alabdallat, Saji Mathradikkal, Husham Abdelrahman, Ayman El-Menyar, Mohammad Asim, Mohammad Kasim, Monira Mollazehi, Ammar Al-Hassani, Ruben Peralta, Sandro Rizoli, Hassan Al-Thani
